second_phase.Description: Information on whether a given participant took part in the second phase of the experiment.

session_order.Description: Information on whether a given participant underwent an EEG session first or a MRI/fMRI session first.

APOE_haplotype.Description: APOE gene haplotype, based on rs429358/rs7412 results.

PICALM_rs3851179.Description: Phosphatidylinositol Binding Clathrin Assembly Protein gene rs3851179.

BMI.Description: Body mass index calculated for each participants, based on height and weight.

allergies.Description: Information on having allergies of any type.

ibuprofen_intake.Description: Information on intake of medication with ibuprofen or other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs.

other_diseases.Description: Health: any other chronic diseases/heatlh problems.

smoking_status.Description: Health: smoking status (including nicotine electric cigarettes).

BDI.Description: Psychometric tests: Beck's Depression Inventory (BDI-II). Total score.

SES.Description: Psychometric tests: Rosenberg's Self-Esteem Scale (SES). Total score.

RPM.Description: Psychometric tests: Raven's Progressive Matrices (RPM) in standard/classic version. Total score.

EHI.Description: Psychometric tests: Edinburgh Handedness Inventory (EHI). Total score.

NEO_NEU.Description: Psychometric tests: NEO-FFI Personality Inventory. Total score on neuroticism scale.

NEO_EXT.Description: Psychometric tests: NEO-FFI Personality Inventory. Total score on extraversion scale.

NEO_OPE.Description: Psychometric tests: NEO-FFI Personality Inventory. Total score on openness scale.

NEO_AGR.Description: Psychometric tests: NEO-FFI Personality Inventory. Total score on agreeableness scale.

NEO_CON.Description: Psychometric tests: NEO-FFI Personality Inventory. Total score on conscientiousness scale.

AUDIT.Description: Psychometric tests: Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test (AUDIT). Total score.

MINI-COPE_1.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 1: points.

MINI-COPE_2.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 2: points.

MINI-COPE_3.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 3: points.

MINI-COPE_4.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 4: points.

MINI-COPE_5.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 5: points.

MINI-COPE_6.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 6: points.

MINI-COPE_7.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 7: points.

MINI-COPE_8.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 8: points.

MINI-COPE_9.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 9: points.

MINI-COPE_10.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 10: points.

MINI-COPE_11.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 11: points.

MINI-COPE_12.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 12: points.

MINI-COPE_13.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 13: points.

MINI-COPE_14.Description: Psychometric tests: Stress coping strategies (Mini-Cope Questionnaire). Question no. 14: points.

CVLT_1.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). List A, task 1-5.

CVLT_2.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). List A, task 1.

CVLT_3.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). List A, task 5.

CVLT_4.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). List B.

CVLT_5.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Short-term delay free recall.

CVLT_6.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Short-term delay cued recall.

CVLT_7.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Long-term delay free recall.

CVLT_8.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Long-term delay cued recall.

CVLT_9.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Perseverations.

CVLT_10.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Intrusion errors - free recall.

CVLT_11.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Intrusion errors - cued recall.

CVLT_12.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Recognition: total hits.

CVLT_13.Description: Psychometric tests: California Verbal Learning Test (CVLT). Recognition: false alarms.

MCV.Description: Blood tests: mean cell volume level (MCV).

MCH.Description: Blood tests: mean cell hemoglobin level (MCH).

MCHC.Description: Blood tests: mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration (MCHC).

RDW-CV.Description: Blood tests: red blood cell distribution width (RDW-CV).

HSV_r.Description: Blood tests: herpes simple virus (HSV) IgG positive result.
